lore: Skyweavers shoot through the air in a prismatic storm of hallucinatory colour and light. While the riders known as Skyborne Princes pilot each jetbike and operate its guns, those called Great Falcons ride pillion, poised to cut down the foe with their star bolas or bisect them with their sweeping zephyrglaives.

faction: Scything Swipes: Each time this unit ends a Normal move
you can select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTER and VEHICLE units) that it moved over during that move. If you do
roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 4+
that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

otherAbilities.Every model is equipped with:: shuriken cannon; star bolas; close combat weapon.
